page.title: 04My School Day In Stevenage.
page.content: I start Wednesday by getting up at 7.00a.m.,brush my teeth, wash,go back to my room and put on my uniform.Going downstairs to the kitchen I have breakfast, which is cereal and tea. I will then watch T.V. until 8.25a.m. when I leave for{Bedwell Comprehensive {School. Walking to school takes 20 minutes.I go in,register and leave for first lesson (which is French) when the bell rings.This is followed by swimming and then break time _ I play football. Science lasts until dinner time,when I eat sandwiches.After lunch is English, Mathematics,History and Geography. School finishes at 3.30pm. Arriving home,I have my dinner at 4.10p.m. usually egg,beans and chips.I spend half an hour on homework,go downstairs and watch T.V. until 10.15pm.,then I go to bed.
